alert.note: Alert for Benton; Lafayette; Marshall (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 3:16AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Lafayette, southeastern Marshall and southwestern Benton Counties through 345 AM CDT... At 316 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Laws Hill, or 9 miles south of Wall Doxey State Park, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Holly Springs, Wall Doxey State Park, Potts Camp, Abbeville, Malone, Waterford, Spring Hill, Hudsonville, Higdon, Gilton, Lake Center, Spraggins and Waites. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
